title: FinPay — Digital Banking Platform
excerpt: Built a real-time digital banking platform handling 50K+ daily transactions with sub-200ms response times and PCI-DSS compliance.
challenge: The client needed a secure, high-performance platform that could process thousands of concurrent transactions while meeting strict financial regulations.
solution: We designed a microservices architecture on AWS with event-driven processing, real-time fraud detection, and an intuitive React dashboard for both customers and back-office teams.

title: MediScan — AI Diagnostic Assistant
excerpt: Developed an AI-powered diagnostic tool that helps radiologists detect anomalies 3x faster with 97% accuracy, processing 10K+ scans monthly.
challenge: Radiologists were overwhelmed by increasing scan volumes, leading to longer wait times and higher risk of missed diagnoses.
solution: We trained a deep learning model on 500K+ annotated medical images and built an intuitive interface that highlights potential anomalies, enabling radiologists to focus on critical cases.

title: RouteIQ — Logistics Optimization
excerpt: Created an intelligent route optimization platform that reduced delivery times by 25% and fuel costs by 18% for a fleet of 500+ vehicles.
challenge: A major logistics provider was losing millions annually due to inefficient routing and poor real-time visibility across their fleet.
solution: We built a real-time optimization engine using machine learning that dynamically adjusts routes based on traffic, weather, and delivery priorities — integrated with existing ERP systems.

title: NordShop — E-Commerce Replatform
excerpt: Re-platformed a legacy e-commerce site to a headless architecture, boosting page speed by 60% and increasing conversion rates by 35%.
challenge: The client's monolithic e-commerce platform was slow, difficult to maintain, and unable to support their rapid growth across global markets.
solution: We migrated to a headless architecture with React Storefront on Vercel, connected to Shopify for commerce, and implemented a CDN-first strategy with edge caching.

title: Iran Lobby — Advocacy PWA
excerpt: A full-stack Progressive Web App built to facilitate political advocacy, featuring offline support, RTL/LTR toggle, and real-time mission tracking.
challenge: Advocates needed a reliable, accessible tool that works even in low-connectivity areas and supports multiple languages and scripts.
solution: We developed a high-performant PWA with a custom service worker for offline functionality and a granular localization system for seamless RTL support.

title: FastingApp — Health Companion
excerpt: An intermittent fasting tracker with personalized coaching, cross-platform sync, and gamified health streaks.
challenge: Users struggled with complex health trackers. The goal was to create a minimalist, habit-forming experience with real-time feedback.
solution: Built a clean mobile-first experience with custom charting and notification systems to drive daily engagement and consistency.

title: EnergyFlow — Predictive Maintenance
excerpt: Machine learning model that predicts industrial equipment failure up to 48 hours in advance, reducing downtime by 30%.
challenge: Unplanned downtime in manufacturing was costing millions. Sensor data was available but not leveraged for predictive insights.
solution: Developed a custom anomaly detection pipeline that processes real-time sensor streams and alerts maintenance teams before failures occur.

title: Pulse — Sentiment AI
excerpt: Advanced NLP platform that analyzes customer feedback across all social channels in real-time, providing actionable sentiment scores.
challenge: Marketing teams were manually reading thousands of comments. They needed a way to spot negative trends instantly.
solution: We fine-tuned a transformer model and built a real-time dashboard that categorizes feedback into categories and triggers alerts for rapid response.
